q: For how long must a mobile/portable x-ray be used in one room to be considered fixed? Does that include C-arms?
a: Direct answer: A mobile/portable radiographic x-ray system used continuously for >1 week in the same location is deemed a fixed radiographic installation and must meet fixed-installation operator-protection standard Article er: I am not legal counsel.
